MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The amphiptere doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Swarming
MonsterTrait.Text: Up to two amphipteres can share the same space at the same time. The amphiptere has advantage on melee attack rolls if it is sharing its space with another amphiptere that isn't incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The amphiptere makes one bite attack and one stinger attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Stinger
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage, and the target must make a successful DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour.
